website_summaries.verdict: The look and comfort of this chair get high marks, and it is super easy to assemble.
pros: Takes just five minutes to assemble
Nailhead accents give this option an elegant, classy look
cons: Comes with an unattractive seam on the back, which may affect how you want to place the chair
Some assembly confusion on how to place legs

customer_reviews.title: Perk up A dull living room
customer_reviews.text: While this chair is probably not one you would want to curl up and read War and Peace in, it is comfortable enough for a short visit with your mother-in-law. I went with pretty neutral colors in my living room so needed something with a little pop, and this chair fit the bill nicely. I added an ottoman and a little Hollywood glam table with a lamp to pull it all together. As others have said, the seam in the back isn't terribly attractive, but against a wall it looks gorgeous. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever made on Amazon, and I've made a lot!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous chair. The seat is plenty wide so that an full size adult sitting in it will not feel like they too big for the chair. It sits so great, with a firm but comfortable seat and the back cushion is supportive and upright but leans back slightly just like an airplane seat reclines. The fine details of this chair give it an elegant look and classy feel to fit any décor. Super easy to put together, LOVE LOVE LOVE these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Merryinside

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for the money and looks great but definitely on the lighter weight side. You wouldn’t want extra heavy ppl sitting in them. Very comfortable but not a chair you could curl up in. Also on hardwoods you’re going to want to put something on bottom of legs so they don’t slide around floor. But all around I am happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman and was able to put this together myself. Once the box was inside the house, I opened it and carried it upstairs piece by piece. It was extremely easy to put together. No parts were missing, nothing was ripped, and it's a nice addition to my small library. I don't have any back or body issues, but I found the chair comfortable. It's very firm, just how I like it. The side table is King's Brand Furniture Accent Side Table I found here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: SparklesTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Nice chairs at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Nice dark brown almost black color "leather". I purchased 2 chairs for next to my fireplace & they complete my living room. One chair arrived with a deep scratch on the cushion & chair leg. Customer service quickly sent me out a new cushion & chair legs. Chairs are a nice size without taking up to much room. They are very nice chairs at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Received promptly (as always from Amazon). Simple to put together (just screw in legs and slip in back section). Comfortable to sit in while watching TV or reading.
customer_reviews.author: Mudville Marty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: Pretty chairs. They are a little firm to sit in but my 9 year old daughter likes to curl up in them. I bought two and the legs on one of them are a little wobbly. The material is thick and seems to be good quality. I need to find a way to support the legs better but they are great for the price though!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Shull

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are not comfortable at all
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are not comfortable at all! While they are beautiful, they are a bit smaller than I predicted. I guess that is the risk of ordering furnishings online. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Van Ooyen

customer_reviews.title: Chic, functional, and stylish
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this was stated to be delivered in like 2 weeks and it came in 2 days. HOORAY!!! It is super easy to put together, took me 5 minutes. It looks slightly different colorwise than in the pictures but still exactly what I needed. A lower sitting chair and not super wide, so it was perfect for the space I needed. Overall I am SO HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Finke

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend these chairs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these chairs in the bonded leather brown. Once they arrived, the material looked cheap, almost plastic. After a couple of months, I noticed the brown color chipping off. Spend a little more and buy better. I wouldn't recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Numan R. Malik

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, compact but pretty
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with them. They’re exactly what I needed. I first saw the reclinable version but I wanted something that wasn’t too high because I didn’t want to take away from the windows right behind it. This chair is compact but sturdy. Arrived well packed and secured. Assembly took 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys M

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: Bonded leather should be primarily be termed as Faux leather or polyurethane, as this is. It is easy to put together, but this chair is hard, not comfy at all. My daughter thinks it will soften with use, but to me it may as well be a bench seat. The color is good, nearly matches my recliner. would never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: sher

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is absolutely stunning and exactly what I was looking for in my reading area! I love the nailhead accents and the colors are beautiful. It looks like it came straight out of a magazine! Plus, the assembly took less than 5 minutes. It was simple, but very sturdy! I would absolutely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Spanninga

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Chair arrived earlier than expected. Very easy to assemble. Please know that the cushions on the back and seat are NOT reversible. The back cushion is attached, and the seat cushion is only upholstered on one side. The bottom (of the grey one) is black and has velcro strips to attach to the base of the chair and prevent slipping. Looks great - just like the picture. And size is good - I'm 5'8 and comfortable sitting in it. I was nervous to purchase furniture online without being able to test it out, but was very pleased with it. Cushions are firm.
customer_reviews.author: EJ Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! The only assembly is screwing on the legs and placing the back into place. It is comfortable but not super soft. The fabric is a heavy weave that resembles burlap but of course very soft. The colors are vibrant, beautiful colors.
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Moody

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, quality product. Easy to put together, literally took 2 minutes. Delivered in a big box, but the chair is light and easy to move. The leather feels like good quality and the cushion is comfortably firm. It is a small chair, but a deep chair. In 6’1” 215lbs and its an excellent fit. Chair height could be taller, but for the price you cannot beat this chair. I recommend, and if I had the room I would buy another to match.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chair in Pewter. It’s a nice neutral color. The chair was super easy to put together. 3 pieces that push together and the legs just screw on with no tools required. It’s small and the seat cushion is very firm. The only down side is that it wiggles from side to side. Needs some sturdier support. Granted this chair is really just for decoration, but it works to sit down for 2 minutes to put on pants or tie shoes in. Would not want to spend hours reading in this chair
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this purchase I purchased two and assembled them ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase I purchased two and assembled them myself the packing was perfect did I say I am pleased? Jp
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely live!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! It is stunning in my living room as an accent chair. It is beautiful just to look at. We are retirees so it will get minimal use. Not a great piece for a house of kids. Serves my purpose of a nice touch in an otherwise rather bland Beige leather living room set. So easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and cute
customer_reviews.text: Arms chairs are really expensive in general, I was shopping EVERYWHERE to find an accent chair. This was 100% the best price/quality I could find. Worth every penny, it’s exactly what my living room needed. Super nice to curl up and read on, has kind of a canvas texture. Pretty stain resistant but is still soft and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVES these chairs. They are gorgeous, look very expensive and appear well made. To top it off, they are actually comfortable to sit it! So happy I decided to get these!!
customer_reviews.author: Jhwag

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Love that it has attached pads on feet. Looks a little small but perfect for me 5"6, husband likes it to and he is over 6". Got it for the room with fire place, like for sitting room.
customer_reviews.author: radmila renee bolhis

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised at how much I love this chair. I was hesitant to order...glad I did. It was easy to assemble. It's the perfect size, I find it comfy
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Maillet

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but very firm and and the back rest ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute but very firm and and the back rest sits back a bit far for short people. I had to put a pillow in the back. Not exactly a chair to lounge in as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Roscoe

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Chair, As Pictured
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as pictured, and I absolutely love it. It looks better in fact than many similar chairs I’ve seen in stores (for considerably higher prices)! I’ve had it for a while, and I couldn’t be happier. I am considering ordering a second one to match.
customer_reviews.author: Little Walrus

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are excellent! They add a bit of sophistication to the ...
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are excellent! They add a bit of sophistication to the room and are well put together.
customer_reviews.author: walkert

customer_reviews.title: WORTH BUYING!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is beautiful—even prettier than in the picture online. I love the colors and the style. It was SUPER EASY to put together—literally screwed 4 legs in and out the back and cushion on. Took less than 10 minutes. I LOVE this chair!!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Prosser

customer_reviews.title: Good material comfy couch
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what ppl are talking about. It’s not that small it’s actually quite comfy. A foot stool is in order though. And the quality is top notch. Great material and workmanship. Came wrapped up real well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lau

customer_reviews.title: It is really pretty and easy to assemble but very small and very ...
customer_reviews.text: It is really pretty and easy to assemble but very small and very uncomfortable. If you are getting it for decorative purposes, then fine. For curling up to read a good book or watch your favorite show, no. I regret getting it.
customer_reviews.author: William Nuckolls

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these chairs! I bought two to go in front of my bay window and they have become the focal point of the room! They are beautiful and actually pretty comfortable. Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Heiner

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these 2 chairs for the welcome center at my church. they have become a big hit, easy for our older members to get out of and comfortable to set in for a long period of time. Love their look as well!
customer_reviews.author: Gayla

customer_reviews.title: Cute & Easy to assemble!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the easiest furniture I have ever assembled. I got the bench ottoman few months ago and really looked forward to getting these. I’m glad I bought it. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Oma

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: We recently had to purchase some new furniture as we bought a bigger house. These chairs have become my favorite ones to sit and read in or drink my morning coffee. They are so comfortable, and just roomy enough without being to bulky. Love these chairs
customer_reviews.author: Christine G.

customer_reviews.title: Good product would buy again and recommendto anyone looking for a small accent chair
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent little accent chair very easy to put together very sturdy. Matches just about any type of decor from farm house 2 French provincial
customer_reviews.author: pic 3

customer_reviews.title: Front legs so flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern but this chairs front legs are very flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this chair so much that I order another. Very easy to assemble got in on time.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia vega

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2. They were easy to assemble. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The other reviews are correct, the seat is "firm", but that's exactly what I wanted. Chair is beautiful and works perfectly as a reading chair/place to sit in my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Plain Jane

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chair for my sitting room. This is also surprisingly comfortable, very good quality and affordable. I LOVE this chair!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Q

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for the money. Well built and the details are very clean. Has a wonderful place to hide your valuables. Was not expecting that. It survived my son lounging in it for 4 days and he is a large man. Really do like the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love my chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love my chairs. They were even prettier than the picture and perfect for the area I wanted them in. Good quality chairs and very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Amd

customer_reviews.title: Funky & Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chair! It’s perfect for our space, giving the room a funky vibe. It’s well made, and definitely a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L.

customer_reviews.title: Great accent chair
customer_reviews.text: We've had lots of compliments on this chair and it makes a beautiful accent in my living room!
customer_reviews.author: Ad's girl

customer_reviews.title: High quality, sturdy, easy to assemble and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Well I have to say I'm really impressed with this club chair. Easy to assemble, very nice quality in every aspect, sturdy and comfortable for me! My husband loves it too. So glad I bought this because I was nervous to buy furniture online. Very happy 😊
customer_reviews.author: sherridw42

customer_reviews.title: good little chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: good little chair for the price. sit's firm but that's no big deal for me. Get lots of compliments on the look.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeTime

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: The chair is comfortable and beautiful... We have received compliments from every person that is seen it in our living room. The only thing we had to do was screw on the legs. I would highly recommend this chair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair!!! Came well packaged and was easy to assemble. It’s comfortable but not for daily use I don’t think. Bought it as an accent chair for my bedroom and the pattern really makes the room pop. Great quality for the price, would definitely buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: JMack

customer_reviews.title: Pretty chair
customer_reviews.text: This a nice quality chair. It is small though. It was smaller than or other chairs so we put it in a bedroom. It is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Trena Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: I love the fabric and it is very comfortable. Very easy to assemble. I have already had lots of nice compliments. They are amazed when I tell them I got it on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Rozbudz

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch of color
customer_reviews.text: Chair is very pretty. Color is as shown..legs are very nice too
customer_reviews.author: dano

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this chair!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these chairs! I wasn’t sure what to expect because the price is so good. The quality is great. Super easy to put together and the colors are exactly as they appear! Will be a returning customer for sure.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonT

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: This made my sitting room very beautiful, I get a lot of compliments from friends and family members visiting .
customer_reviews.author: Osk

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it, No assembly needed except attaching the legs in 30 seconds!
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, I completed in less than 5 minutes. Chair is very comfortable and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good chairs. Size is accurate to description
customer_reviews.text: Good chairs. Size is accurate to description. Pictures on Amazon are a good representation of the product. Only issue is that the front legs look slightly crooked. I don't think they are, just look that way. Happy with this chair. We bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Rana

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two of them and they are NICE! Very well made and look so nice in ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of them and they are NICE! Very well made and look so nice in my living room. I've had several compliments. Well packed upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: SS in Arkansas

customer_reviews.title: very easy to put together however as I was screwing in ...
customer_reviews.text: very easy to put together however as I was screwing in one of the legs a piece of wood chipped off the leg, I had not over tighten as I had at least a couple more times for the leg to be correctly tightened.
customer_reviews.author: madsam

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price and great quality!
customer_reviews.text: They size of the chairs were perfect for my small office area and are comfortable. Great quality too! Assembly was very easy and took me only 3-4 min per chair.
customer_reviews.author: wesley

customer_reviews.title: Solid.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect chair, loved by all that visit, also one of my friends are going to buy one too for her bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was sized just right. Color was spot on for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Myron A. Stovell

customer_reviews.title: not bad....
customer_reviews.text: dark chocolate color, nail head trim, small for small spaces....
customer_reviews.author: Daisy K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent relaxing chair
customer_reviews.text: After a long day at work I sit down in this chair and forget worries. The chair is very comfortable and stylish. Hey man have a cigar!

customer_reviews.title: Amazon delivers again!!!! Great product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the chair. AMAZON DELIVERS AGAIN. I will enjoy this in my new home.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K. Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Back is loose,
customer_reviews.text: I like the look. But the size and comfort and sturdiness is not good
customer_reviews.author: Linda Goheen

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: Truly love this chair. Was skeptical at first but the size was great. It is also comfortable
customer_reviews.author: tricia salmon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is exactly what I wanted. Super cute and stylish and seriously comfortable. It has become my new favorite chair and looks great as an accent piece! Buy it you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Janson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Good chair. It does get comfortable after a while sitting things about a week or two to break in overall nice chair for the quality and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Eehhh...
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put together, just a bit of a cheaper chair. Good for looks, not sitting
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Easton

customer_reviews.title: Great side chair for living room!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my new chair! So easy to put together, comfortable and looks great! It’s brand new but seems sturdy enough to last.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect piece
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! My family and friends really like it. Easy to assemble and sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good size for teenagers bedroom not quality enough for a family or living room setting

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Christopher Knight Home 237354 the Denise Austin Home Vandor Bonded Leather Features Studs, Tufting, and Even Carved Wood Legs That Denote Only the Finest Club Chair Elegance is a fancy looking chair and is perfect for reading and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: William H Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I got a lot of compliments on these chairs. Nice size for short people and great accents pieces. Very sturdy and comfortable chairs

customer_reviews.title: Its a comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.text: The coloring was a little off,the blue was really green.Its a comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for reading not for Lounging
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chair. Perfect for reading and doing homework along with a table. If your looking to sink into this chair for comfort, you might want to rethink your purchase. It’s sturdy and firm.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a beauitfull chair and very comfortable thank you
customer_reviews.author: Linda J Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good chair, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal! This chair is listed for over $150 under names. It's a perfect size and color for my space. Sits a little firm but doesn't have that sitting on cardboard feel. Perfect for an occasional use chair. Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Robin  W.

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was simple and it’s super comfortable. Bought for my office
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was simple and it’s super comfortable. Bought for my office! Will post pics when Office is all put together
customer_reviews.author: Ashley lotta

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This chair literally was easy to put together as 1 2 3. No tools needed. Seat is firm which I like because it’s not too soft or hard and seems like it will last long. I initially want two but wasn’t sure if my space was big enough. I love as the new addition to my living room. I still may order another one. Oh and the shipping was faster than expected.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable...just what I had been wanting. The color was more black than brown but other than that It was just fine.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Priced Well
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some club chairs that were inexpensive as they are for my formal living room and would not be used very much. I saw these on Amazon and they were priced very reasonable. I was very surprised and happy upon receiving them as they were much nicer than I expected and have completed look i was intending.

customer_reviews.title: If leather is your choice for a chair of this type, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Like the chair very much but nowhere on the required list of materials used in manufacture is the word 'leather'. I do not personally think this is leather but a fairly good synthetic.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful chair. Not the most comfortable, but for the price I am VERY happy.

customer_reviews.title: Classy club chair
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my family room. They’re easy to assemble and look amazing!

customer_reviews.title: Very Pretty! Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! SUPER easy to put together! The legs are in a zip section under the chair. It is a beautiful chair! Teal, mauve, and white. Gorgeous! Perfect for a bedroom. I’m not sure I would use as an everyday chair though.

customer_reviews.title: Advertise accurately. Nice chair.
customer_reviews.text: I like the splash of soft color in our bedroom.

customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and firm chair. Love how it looks in my office.

customer_reviews.title: Love the chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love the chairs. Great color (grey), great quality for the price, and pretty comfortable once you break them in a bit. Family loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable chair in the world but I love the way it fits my room.

customer_reviews.title: Really great! Good deal and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!!! It’s really pretty and comfy! Good price and shipped fast too!

customer_reviews.title: its a chair for a dining area, not for lounging
customer_reviews.text: You should only buy these chairs if you are interested in having a dining table chair, they are not arm chairs where you can lean back without any leg support in front of you. From what I have been finding out, the lounging chair (like in starbucks, something like their leather chairs is what I originally was looking for) should have the length of no less than 34-38" (with seating detpth at least 26"). These chairs are good for sitting by the table, they would give you a fancy restaurant feel. The way it's pictured in the add makes it look as a lounging chair, but it's not.
customer_reviews.author: kkostya777

customer_reviews.title: No Bueno
customer_reviews.text: Really cheap, leather around buttons peeled off in a month!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful chair, nice color, very easy to assemble and price is very good

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chairs for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chairs for the price, they were perfect for what I wanted them for. Took a little bit of work to get the back on all the way.
